meanings.definition: Characterized by humor or a sense of humor.
meanings.sent1: The humoristic movie made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: She has a humoristic personality that brightens up the room.
meanings.sent3: The humoristic joke at the party had everyone chuckling.
meanings.sent4: His humoristic nature is like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The humoristic story was so funny that it stayed in everyone's memory.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of humor.
meanings.sent1: The humoristic comic strip always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent2: The humoristic elements in the play added a light-hearted touch.
meanings.sent3: The humoristic twist in the plot caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her humoristic approach to life is truly refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The humoristic tone of the book made it an enjoyable read.

meanings.definition: Displaying humor or a sense of humor.
meanings.sent1: His humoristic remarks during the meeting lightened the mood.
meanings.sent2: The humoristic banter between friends was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The humoristic way she handled the situation impressed everyone.
meanings.sent4: Their humoristic interactions always bring joy to those around them.
meanings.sent5: The humoristic atmosphere at the party made it a night to remember.
